item.title: Book Review: Elon Musk
item.description: “Adversity shaped me,” he (Musk) says. “My pain threshold become very high.” So I just finished reading the Walter Isaacson biography: Elon Musk. My honest review of the book is that it’s ok. It’s not bad, not good; it’s average and I rate it 2.5/5. I first read Ashlee Vance’s book: Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future back in 2015, and that was absolutely fantastic.
